structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.text: No person shall ride a horse, nor shall the owner of a horse consent to the racing of his horse, in a horse race on a highway.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4348.
